page.title: 19RETIREMENT IN BUDE
page.content: There are many people living in the area who have retired from work.The largest concentration of retired people is found on the {Moor Estate}on the edge of{Poughill}village.The estate consists mainly of 2-bedroomed bungalows,and although it is on the edge of the village,it has fine views of the coast southwards .Other retired people live in more remote and isolated properties particularly at {Stibb. The people on the Moor Estate moved to Bude from all over the country but particularly from London and the Midlands.Many moved because they either had families or friends living here, or because they wanted to enjoy the peace and quiet.Some people enjoy the milder winters and warmer summers.
